name: Silk Shortbread
overview:
This thick, pure butter, melt-in-your-mouth shortbread is baked with our personal attention and lots of love. It is carefully prepared to ensure a perfectly delicious gourmet cookie, every single time. Silk Shortbread obtains its delicate taste from the finest butter available. All of our ingredients are fresh and free of preservatives. For keeping Silk Shortbread at its best, we follow the tradition of packaging in old-fashioned tins that are both decorative and collectorable.

From the letters and comments folks share, Silk Shortbread seems to stir childhood memories of the comforting tastes of home. For those who like to travel, Silk Shortbread will also remind you of tea time in the quaint cottages or tea rooms of the United Kingdom.

We hope our classic buttery Silk Shortbread family recipe brings to mind many of your own fond memories while you enjoy this with loved ones.â€

  • Jean Silk Founder & Pastry Chef
